articles.description: Maine's seven-day average of new cases has climbed to levels not seen since May, and 60 people were hospitalized Wednesday, the most since June 6.
articles.content:
Hospitalizations for COVID-19 are rising again in Maine as state health officials reported 217 new cases of COVID-19 on Wednesday, but no additional deaths.
